channel.title: [317] Changing Item requirements, d claws, Gs's etc [317]
channel.description:
How do i change the requirements on items? Im made myself admin, tried make myself donator and it wont work, so i can't weild d claws, and other items, how do i change the requirements to where anyone can weild them as well as level to make it to where you need a certain level to weild the item.
Thanks!

item.title: [317] Changing Item requirements, d claws, Gs's etc [317]
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

lol you using my source why didn’t you ask me??

If in game you try to wear an item and it tells you that you need to be a donator Go to client.java and search for

if(wearID ==

Then look for the item code like the d clawz

if(wearID == 8002 && (donator != 1)) { // by Owner Bashar sM("You Need To Be A Donator To Wear This Item."); return false; }
If you want to delete that every player can wear the d clawz then delete it…

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Changing Item requirements, d claws, Gs's etc [317]
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Ok so, i went to my client.java, typed in the item id. and i found this at the bottom…

if(wearID == 8002 && (donator != 1)) { // by Owner Bashar
sM(“You Need To Be A Donator To Wear This Item.”);
return false;
}

To make it for anyone, what do i need to fix??

Read full topic
